data.title: Republic Airways Reports July 2013 Traffic
data.meta_description: Republic Airways Reports July 2013 Traffic  INDIANAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Republic Airways Holdings (NAS: RJET) , today reported preliminary passenger traffic results for July 2013. The Company generated approximately 1.9 billion revenue
data.text:
INDIANAPOLIS--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Republic Airways Holdings (NAS: RJET) , today reported preliminary passenger traffic results for July 2013. The Company generated approximately 1.9 billion revenue passenger miles (RPMs), a decrease of 5% from July 2012, on a 5% reduction in available seat miles (ASMs). Block hours were 3% greater than the same period in 2012. Consolidated load factor remained the same from July 2012 at 86%. Republic Airways carried 2.9 million passengers in June, a 3% increase from the prior year.

Republic Airways Holdings, based in Indianapolis, Indiana, is an airline holding company that owns Chautauqua Airlines, Frontier Airlines, Republic Airlines and Shuttle America, collectively "the airlines." The airlines operate a combined fleet of more than 285 aircraft and offer scheduled passenger service on over 1,600 flights daily to nearly 145 cities in the U.S. as well as to the Bahamas, Canada, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, Jamaica, Mexico and Turks and Caicos Islands under branded operations at Frontier, and through fixed-fee flights operated under airline partner brands, including AmericanConnection, Delta Connection, United Express, and US Airways Express. The airlines currently employ approximately 10,000 aviation professionals. For more information on Republic Airways, please visit our website at www.rjet.com.

Republic Airways Holdings

Margaret Miller, 317-246-2628

KEYWORDS: United States North America Indiana
